artifacts.title: Antikythera Mechanism
artifacts.description: The Antikythera Mechanism: ancient Greek calculator predicting astronomical positions and eclipses.
artifacts.author: Marsyas

artifacts.title: Rosetta Stone
artifacts.description: The Rosetta Stone, inscribed in three scripts, was key to deciphering Egyptian hieroglyphs.
artifacts.author: McKay Savage

artifacts.title: Dead Sea Scrolls
artifacts.description: The Dead Sea Scrolls: ancient Jewish texts from Qumran, containing oldest biblical manuscripts.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Terracotta Army
artifacts.description: The Terracotta Army: life-sized sculptures depicting the armies of Qin Shi Huang, first Emperor of China.
artifacts.author: xiquinhosilva

artifacts.title: Tutankhamun's Mask
artifacts.description: Tutankhamun's Mask is the iconic gold funerary mask of the young Egyptian pharaoh Tutankhamun.
artifacts.author: Tarekheikal

artifacts.title: Baghdad Battery
artifacts.description: The Baghdad Battery is a clay jar with a copper cylinder, speculated to be an ancient battery.
artifacts.author: guieldo

artifacts.title: Piri Reis Map
artifacts.description: The Piri Reis Map, compiled in 1513, accurately depicts parts of the Americas and Africa.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Shroud of Turin
artifacts.description: Faint image of a man on linen cloth. Claimed to be Jesus' burial shroud. Religious icon, debated for centuries.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Ain Ghazal Statues
artifacts.description: The Ain Ghazal Statues are pre-pottery Neolithic lime plaster figures from Jordan.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Nebra Sky Disc
artifacts.description: The Nebra Sky Disc is a Bronze Age artifact possibly used for astronomical observations.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Sutton Hoo Helmet
artifacts.description: The Sutton Hoo Helmet is an ornate Anglo-Saxon helmet from an early medieval ship burial.
artifacts.author: Paul Hudson

artifacts.title: Book of Kells
artifacts.description: The Book of Kells is a lavishly decorated manuscript of the Gospels from the early medieval period.
artifacts.author: Zairon

artifacts.title: Bayeux Tapestry
artifacts.description: The Bayeux Tapestry: embroidered cloth depicting events leading to the Norman Conquest of England.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Gough Map
artifacts.description: The Gough Map is one of the oldest surviving maps of Great Britain.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Vinland Map
artifacts.description: Vinland map: hotly debated 15th-century chart. Shows Vinland, pre-Columbus, but ink analysis fuels authenticity questions.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Imperial Crown (Vienna Treasury)
artifacts.description: Imperial Crown: Key regalia of Holy Roman Emperors. A treasured medieval symbol, Vienna Treasury collection.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Proto-cuneiform Tablet
artifacts.description: Proto-cuneiform tablet: early writing with pictographs.  Likely records grain, temple economy. Seal shows priest-king.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Lion Man
artifacts.description: The Lion Man is a prehistoric ivory sculpture depicting a human-lion hybrid.
artifacts.author: Public Domain

artifacts.title: Bush Barrow Gold Lozenge
artifacts.description: Golden artifacts near Stonehenge suggest ritualistic practices in Bronze Age Britain.
artifacts.author: Anthony Johnson

artifacts.title: Gjermundbu Helmet
artifacts.description: The Gjermundbu helmet is a rare Viking Age artifact discovered in Norway.
artifacts.author: NTNU Vitenskapsmuseet
